name: HIIT Blast
description: A high-intensity interval training (HIIT) class designed to push your limits and maximize calorie burn. This fast-paced, full-body workout incorporates a variety of exercises to keep you engaged and challenged.

name: Yoga Flow
description: A calming and rejuvenating yoga class that focuses on breath and movement synchronization. Suitable for all levels, this class helps improve flexibility, strength, and mental clarity.

name: Pilates Core
description: Strengthen your core muscles with Pilates exercises that enhance stability, flexibility, and overall body awareness. This class is ideal for building a strong foundation and improving posture.

name: Cardio Kickboxing
description: An energetic and fun cardio workout that combines kickboxing techniques with high-intensity cardio. Burn calories, build strength, and improve coordination in this dynamic class.

name: Zumba Dance
description: Join the party with Zumba, a dance fitness class featuring Latin and international music. Get your heart pumping and enjoy a full-body workout that's both effective and enjoyable.

name: Spin Cycle
description: A high-energy indoor cycling class that simulates various outdoor terrains. Boost your cardiovascular endurance and lower body strength while riding to motivating music.

name: Barre Fitness
description: A low-impact workout that combines elements of ballet, Pilates, and yoga. Focus on small, controlled movements to build strength, flexibility, and endurance.

name: Meditation and Mindfulness
description: A class dedicated to enhancing mental well-being through guided meditation and mindfulness practices. Learn techniques to reduce stress, improve focus, and cultivate inner peace.

name: CrossFit Fundamentals
description: An introductory class to CrossFit, covering the fundamental movements and techniques. Build strength, agility, and cardiovascular fitness with varied and scalable workouts.

name: Powerlifting Basics
description: Learn the basics of powerlifting, focusing on the three main lifts: squat, bench press, and deadlift. This class is perfect for those looking to build strength and improve lifting technique.
